tika.dc.description: This book, with contributions from some of the best-known and most visible specialists in the field, re-examines the significant transfers, cross-fertilisations and synergies of cultural and literary theory between Russia and the West, from the 1920s through to the present day.
tika.dc.rights: © 2010 Editorial selection and matter, Alastair Renfrew and Galin Tihanov; individual chapters, the contributors
tika.dc.subject: Interdisciplinary Studies
